Areas.name: mm2
Areas.Help:
For ALTTP: Kakariko includes standard Kakariko definition (the 13 checks + sick kid), magic bat, library/maze race, lost woods/ped, lumberjack, bonk rocks, and king's tomb. South Light World includes Link's House, shovel check, aginah/desert ledge, and dam/mini moldorm/ice rod cave. Northeast Light World includes Lake Hylia Island, Hobo, sasha's hut/gp turn in, mushroom turn in, and Zora's Domain.
Death Mountain Starts when you enter Old Man Cave and then the rest of DM Death Mountain includes Mimic Cave and Floating Island
Dark World is everything not on Dark Death Mountain You can scout the Dark Death Mountain count by using the portal on DM below Hera Cave 45, Graveyard Ledge, Checkerboard Cave, and Bombos Tablet are Dark World Smith and Purple Chest are Dark World The Mire Area is Dark World (just the 2 checks in shed)
Escape includes the 2 Uncle checks
The Dungeons should be obvious (you can scout SP without mirror and reveal its items)
SM should Follow the SM FC closely but has larger areas: Crateria Includes Crateria up to the far moat door (moat missles is in Crat) Crateria ALSO includes Blue Brin
Green/Pink Brinstar is Green + Pink Brinstar
Red Brinstar and Kraid are combined
Wrecked Ship is all of Wrecked Ship proper + Outside Crateria You can scout wrecked ship by going across the moat to West Ocean. (this is earlier than you can see if Phantoon is a pendant/crystal) If for some headass reason you go through Forgotten Highway the offical Maridia/WS split is on the elevator
Back Maridia is Botwoon tank, precious missile, space, plasma, and springball. Front Maridia is everything else in Maridia. You must actually break the tube and enter Maridia to scout it. Running through the tube does not count.
Upper Norfair is Ice/HJB/Croc Escape/Cathedral/Bubble Mountain Crocomire is the 5 items that require a Croc kill to access You must ride the elevator down to Norfair to Scout Norfair (just going to Kraid doesnt count) Lower Norfair does not begin until you ride the elevator to LN so you cant scout it just by doing lava dive.
Lower Norfair is all of Lower Norfair. Upper Norfair begins again when you enter back into Single Chamber.
